msg.msgText: The initial packet is too large.

msgExplanation.p: The packet size of the initial data packet is too large. The size of the first packet is restricted because the packet is sent before authorization. This error can be a symptom of a denial of service attack.

msgUserResponse.p: If there are a large number of these disconnects, check whether the network has a problem or whether there is a denial of service attack on the server.
